```{r Setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
```

```{r Dependencies, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
source('config.R')
source('auxs.R')

library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)
library(readr)
library(sp)
```


```{r Load, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
key <- read_file('key.txt')
data <- get_data(key, save_backup = TRUE, ignore_future = TRUE)
```

```{r Filter, warning=FALSE}
data_table <- select(data, Date, Name, Type, Language)
```
## Preimpresiones
```{r Preprints}
preprints <- filter(data, Type == 'Preprint')
preprints <- select(preprints, Date, NameURL, Role)

preprints_num <- nrow(preprints)
```

Tengo `r preprints_num` preimpresiones esperando a ser publicadas:

```{r PreprintsTab}
kable(preprints, format='pandoc')
```

## Libros

```{r Books}
## Books and book chapters
books <- filter(data, Type == 'Book' & (Role == 'Chapter author' | Role == 'Author'))
books <- select(books, Date, Name, Role, Institution)

books_num <- nrow(books)
```

He participado en la redacción de `r books_num` libro:

```{r BooksTab}
kable(books, format='pandoc')
```

## Software científico
```{r Code}
code <- filter(data, Type == 'Code')
code <- select(code, Date, NameURL, Role, Language)

code_num <- nrow(code)
```

He publicado `r code_num` pequeños proyectos de software científico:

```{r CodeTab}
kable(code, format='pandoc')
```
